metadata.title: No Bitcoin recovery before Spring 2026 if Fed doesn’t cut rates, warn Russian experts
metadata.description: US spending figures may cause Fed to act, says exchange exec. Talk of BTC’s imminent sustainable recovery is premature, says mining chief. If Bitcoin prices don’t return to $93,000 by Monday, a quick rebound is unlikely.
metadata.keywords: Oleg Kalmanovich, price recovery, Vasily Girya, Fed
